text:
In this experience I want to take you through some examples of    our new paint portfolio for the S-Class. From a striking rosé gold metallic to an unexpected light moss green uni, and all the way to entirely new shades of blue and black: We believe that with this color palette we meet the highest demands for customisation and exclusivity.
To define our MANUFAKTUR paint portfolio, we generally draw inspiration from three sources:

1.Our repertoire of colors developed over time for specific customer requests
2. Our archive of historic Mercedes-Benz colours (Heritage), following the mantra of Mercedes-Benz Chief Designer Gorden Wagener: "WE REVIVE old colours."
3. Development of new colors

599U MANUFAKTUR Ireland mid green magno (new SL colour)
Personal favorite
Color originates from the historic Maybach collection, where it was available as a metallic paint. 
Draws inspiration from the Irish Highlands. 
Exceptionally high-quality finish enriched with a multitude of effect pigments offering a dynamic, multi-tonal look. 
Already know this paint from the SL, where we re-introduced it as part of our extended MANUFAKTUR portfolio.

First OEM to bring Magno paints into series production.
Today, all Magno paints are part of the MANUFAKTUR programme; MANUFAKTUR signature element. 

With their matte clear coat, they deliver a satin-like, matte appearance – particularly popular on AMG models.

825U MANUFAKTUR classicgrün uni (G) - alter 50er Jahre Lack „dunkelgrün uni“
255U MANUFAKTUR oliv metallic (G & S-Class) – alter designo Lack
271U MANUFAKTUR citrinbraun magno (G)

996U MANUFAKTUR hyazinthrot metallic

Iconic designo color available across numerous models
Hyacinth Red was created to achieve an intensely luminous red. 
Introduced a new pigment, used for the first time in Mercedes-Benz’s palette, to achieve its vibrant brilliance.

Metallic Paints: Contain metallic particles in the basis coat, 
making the paint sparkle and enhancing its brilliance (e.g., Rosé Gold Metallic).

685U MANUFAKTUR yellowstone uni (GT 4-Door)
658U MANUFAKTUR kupferorange magno (G & GT 4-Door)
817U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv roségold metallic

799U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv diamantweiß bright

Historic designo color that revolutionized automotive paint. 
Marked the debut of a production-ready pearl white finish, 
no other manufacturer had achieved at the time. 
Diamond White became the benchmark for multi-layered pearl white paints in series production

Solid Paints: Offer a rich, uniform look without metallic particles in the clear coat, 
resulting in an even and consistent colour (e.g., Classic Green Uni).

685U MANUFAKTUR yellowstone uni (GT 4-Door)
658U MANUFAKTUR kupferorange magno (G & GT 4-Door)
817U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv roségold metallic

379U MANUFAKTUR orange flame metallic

A new addition to the SL and GT color palette
Orange Flame Metallic radiates energy and modernity, 
making a striking statement on the road. (Bentley Paint)

685U MANUFAKTUR yellowstone uni (GT 4-Door)
658U MANUFAKTUR kupferorange magno (G & GT 4-Door)
817U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv roségold metallic

162U MANUFAKTUR südseeblau metallic (G)

Some of you may remember this colour from the A-Class (W176). 
Back then, all A-Class paints were inspired by natural phenomena. 
This deep blue is inspired by natural phenomena. 
Its rich tone evokes the mesmerizing depths of the ocean.

896U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv brilliantblau metallic (G)
183U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv magnetitschwarz metallic (G)

124U MANUFAKTUR classicgrau uni (G & GT 4-Door)

Heritage Mercedes-Benz colour, first introduced around the 1950s. 
It pays homage to the brand's storied past while remaining timelessly elegant.

Solid Paints: Offer a rich, uniform look without metallic particles in the clear coat, 
resulting in an even and consistent colour (e.g., Classic Green Uni).

734U MANUFAKTUR hightechsilber magno (SL, GT & GLC)

Modern reinterpretation of the iconic Mercedes-Benz silver. 
Features a more dynamic light-dark contrast. 

Unlike its predecessor, which leaned towards a flat, silvery-white tone, 
High-Tech Silver comes to life with greater depth, a subtle hue, 
and striking shifts between light and shadow.

896U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv brilliantblau metallic (G)
183U MANUFAKTUR exklusiv magnetitschwarz metallic (G)
